marklogic.body: "Son of Satan"? "Creep"? This shows how Fox news and its cast of Flatulence-spewing talking heads have poisoned the minds of so many individuals with a sharp departure from reason, logic, and just plain civil discourse. Obama may not be perfect but he certainly stands head and heels above Romney and the rest of the Republican circus train, who seem too eager to bomb Iran. How can anyone say the EPA is restrictive when Republicans are proposing to do vaginal probes on women wanting abortions and restrict something as all-American as voting with laws like Florida's Ban on voter registration drives? Sorry right wingers but your hypocrisy is showing.
